name: Relics of Stone
description:
A puzzle game made for Godot Wild Jam #50 "RITUAL".

You are lost in a magical ruin. This place is endless and desolate, with lifeless stones floating in the air. While admiring the beautiful scenery of death, you worry about how to get out of here. Then, you met a witch who tells you that she has a way to escape, but she can't do it alone, as long as you help her complete a series of magical rituals, maybe you can leave here.

Controls MoveW A S D   or  ↑ ← ↓ →Use ScrollsEZoomZ and  XChange ViewFRestart LevelR Source

Made with Godot 4.0 beta3. 🔗GitHub

Credits

This game used some pre-made assets, see Credits page.
